tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE RouteHistory (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    route_details TEXT,
    start_time timestamp,
    end_time timestamp
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
    vehicle_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(100),
    model VARCHAR(100),
    last_known_location GEOGRAPHY,
    last_update TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE drivers (
    driver_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    hire_date DATE,
    supervisor_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (supervisor_id) REFERENCES drivers(driver_id)
);

CREATE TABLE routes (
    route_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    route_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_location GEOGRAPHY,
    end_location GEOGRAPHY,
    distance_km FLOAT,
    estimated_time TIME,
    vehicle_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sensors (
    sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
    installation_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20),
    vehicle_id UUID,
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES vehicles(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE route_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id UUID NOT NULL,
    route_id UUID NOT NULL,
    start_location GEOGRAPHY(POINT) NOT NULL,
    end_location GEOGRAPHY(POINT) NOT NULL,
    start_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
